spec_data.Name: drupal7-l10n_update
spec_data.Description:
Automatically download and update your translations fetching them from
localize.drupal.org [1] or any other localization server [2].

This package provides the following Drupal module:
* l10n_update

[1] http://localize.drupal.org/
[2] http://drupal.org/project/l10n_server
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 18 Sep 2017 12:59:24 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Provides automatic downloads and updates for translations
